thag4.12:5.1: I went forth to save my life.
thag4.12:6.1: gladly, let this body be broken!
thag4.12:6.2: Let this lump of meat be dissolved!
thag4.12:6.3: Let both my legs fall off
thag4.12:7.1: I won’t eat, I won’t drink,
thag4.12:7.3: nor will I lie down on my side,
thag4.12:7.4: until the dart of craving is drawn out.
